TopicTitle: Planning my first module for my Mun Base.

Articles.Content:
I have recently sent a rover to Duna, and now I want to practice my pin-point landings. That led me to plan out my very first Mun Base.

So, what modules so I put first? Habitat? Comms?

Yeah, first, sorry for my english ;D

The questions is wich typ do you want to build?

The easy one ? ( Making diferent landers and land them in one area)

Or the much harder one? ( One base core/headquarter and dock the other parts on - thats what im trying to do...)
